TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit StylusPlugIn extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示外掛程式，這個外掛程式可以加入至控制項的 屬性。

span.span: Represents a plug-in that can be added to a control's property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可讓您管理個別執行緒上的物件。The allows you to manipulate objects on separate threads. 使筆墨仍會轉譯為平板電腦手寫筆輸入資料，即使應用程式所執行的其他動作，會使用個別的執行緒。Separate threads are used so that the ink still renders as the tablet pen inputs data even if the application is doing something else. 若要攔截手寫筆的點，從硬體，建立繼承自類別類別。To intercept stylus points from the hardware, create a class that inherits from the class. 類別具有下列方法，您可以覆寫來操作畫筆執行緒上的物件執行緒集區。The class has the following methods that you can override to manipulate objects on a thread in the pen thread pool. - - - - - 畫筆的輸入會路由傳送至的項目畫筆執行緒上。The pen's input is routed to an element's on the pen thread. 畫筆執行緒上無法執行精確的點擊測試，因為有些項目偶爾可能會收到其他項目的手寫筆輸入。Since accurate hit-testing cannot be performed on the pen thread, some elements might occasionally receive stylus input intended for other elements. 如果您需要確定輸入執行作業之前已正確傳遞，訂閱，並執行中的作業， ，或方法。If you need to make sure the input was routed correctly before performing an operation, subscribe to and perform the operation in the , , or method. 執行精確的點擊測試之後，由主應用程式執行緒會叫用這些方法。These methods are invoked by the main application thread after accurate hit-testing has been performed. 若要訂閱這些方法，呼叫發生於畫筆執行緒的方法中的方法。To subscribe to these methods, call the method in the method that occurs on the pen thread. 例如，如果您呼叫中，則，就會發生。For example, if you call in , the occurs. > [!NOTE] > 如果您使用深入了解控制中，您應該測試外掛程式，並廣泛地控制，以確定它們不會擲回任何非預期的例外狀況。If you use a inside a control, you should test the plug-in and control extensively to make sure they do not throw any unintended exceptions. ## XAML 文字使用方式XAML Text Usage 這個類別不通常用於 XAML。This class is not typically used in XAML. ## Examples 下列範例會建立自訂，限制到特定區域在控制項上的筆墨。The following example creates a custom that constrains the ink to a certain area on the control. [!code-csharp[StylusPluginSamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusPluginSamples/CSharp/FilterPlugin.cs#1)] [!code-vb[StylusPluginSamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusPluginSamples/VisualBasic/FilterPlugin.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 快取來執行其元素的邊界的點擊測試。The caches the bounds of its element to perform hit testing. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何，該項則繼承自，會使用轉譯筆劃。The following example demonstrates how a , which inherits from , uses an to render a stroke. 這個筆刷部分繪製所指定的映像檔案`imageFile`。This brush partially draws the image file specified by `imageFile`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法是發生於畫筆執行緒，因此最小化在這個方法，以避免影響效能的工作。This method occurs on a pen thread, so minimize work in this method to avoid impacting performance. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何覆寫方法。The following example demonstrates how to override the method. 若要建立可限制到特定區域的筆墨，請參閱概觀。To create a that restricts ink to a certain area, see the overview.
